text: Roger Craig Smith (born August 11, 1975) is an American voice actor and former stand-up comedian who does voice roles for video games, television and movies. He is known as the current voice behind Chris Redfield in the Resident Evil series. He voices Ezio Auditore da Firenze in the Assassin's Creed games.
